name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.57 - The Maze
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Kick! Punch! Pissed off! The inhumane and evil maze battle is here!
Setting traps, flying tools, direct attacks, you can place radical obstacles as many as you like!
Seize the key before your opponent and locate the exit!
In this maze battle game, the person who runs around and escapes first from the 3D maze wins.
Equipped with an automatic maze-generating function, you will not get bored with this game!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
